comments:
NullPointerException when generating test reports.

The below exception is thrown when attempting to generate a test report (e.g. 
selecting an output project for the report) using the Hyades v3.3 
(20050214_1001) driver (see 
http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/indextools.cgi/~checkout~/hyades-
home/docs/TPTP_Testing_Strategy.html for steps to reproduce):

Now that we have a "3.3" Version in bugzilla, updating bugzillas targeted to 3.3
or a 3.3 iteration so that their Version matches their Target. "future",
"unspecified", "4.0", and "4.1" Versions will not be updated.

Bianca -- we talked about this last week, and I think you may have already fixed
this.  If so, can you please resolve this?  Thanks!

From the stack trace, this NPE happens when validating report file name on new
report wizard. However, with fix to the report problem in 3.3, see
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=92435, can not reproduce
this(tested with Http test cases from org.eclipse.hyades.tests). Thus dup this
to 92435.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 92435 ***

Verified in TPTP 4.0 (HEAD) build (200504280100) on May 2, 2005.

Note:  Canot verify in Hyades 3.3 (HEAD) due to defect 
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=93410.
